Name: Wesley Milestone 2.0 Casual Waterproof Laptop Backpack/Office Bag/School Bag/College Bag/Business Bag/Travel Backpack (Dimensions:13x18 inches) (Compatible with 39.62cm(15.6inch laptop) 30 L (Blue & black)
Description:
Product Description 

 



   


 









 





 





 






 Ergonomic Contoured Shape   With a slim, sleek and compact design you will love how this backpack can look small even with a spacious storage!  



 Fits Your Laptop   Take your gadgets with you anywhere with this backpack, it has got allotted storage space that fits a laptop of upto 15.6 inches.  



 Strong and Lightweight    Designed with great quality materials that are waterproof, tough and durable, it is also lightweight and easy to maintain.  









 








 

 Padded Back Straps   The back straps are padded to give the user maximum support and it made with anti-sweat fabric, giving you the comfort throughout the day.  



 

 Spacious Storage   Featuring 2 compartments, the main compartment and a front compartment to store smaller objects/pens/thin notebooks etc. It also includes a laptop sleeve with a Velcro strap for safety.  



 

 Back Support   It won’t feel uneasy to carry heavy things for a longer time with this bag as it has a cushioned back support that distributes weight evenly between your shoulders and back.  



 

 A Bag for any weather   Be it those stormy rainy season, scorching heat, or freezing winters, this bag can endure as it is crafted, designed and made with quality and tough materials.

Name: Half Moon 35 Ltrs Water Resistant 15.6 inch Laptop Bag for Men/Backpack for Men, Navy Blue | Office Bag for Men/Office Bag for Women with Padded Laptop Compartment | Rain Cover & Reflective Strips
Description:
Product Description 




   

 
  Half Moon Backpack - A Quality of Backpacks     We(Half Moon) are sellers and manufacturers of various types of Customized Bags. Our product array comprises Backpacks, Sports Bags, Duffel Bags, Drawstring Bags, etc. These bags accomplish the customer's specifications and requirements. We provide these bags in numerous colors, designs, shapes, shades, patterns, etc. Our bags are known for lightweight, easy carrying, versatile usage, and durable nature.    

 
  Features     DURABLE MATERIAL: Made with strong polyester fabric with heavy zippers. Serves the need of a professional office laptop bag, college bag, student backpack, school bag and is suitable for all, i.e. boys, girls, men and women.  COMFY & STURDY: Its padded, adjustable shoulder straps do not put pressure on the shoulders. Foamed padded top handle is easy on your palm and fingers. INNER MATERIAL: The material used in the inner compartments is thin yet strong and durable so, be assured of its quality. Thin material is used inside to make it lightweight & comfortable in carrying and to protect it from wear & tear. LOTS OF STORAGE SPACE & POCKETS: One separate Padded laptop compartment. Multiple compartments can store lots of stuff, that too organised. OTHER FEATURES: Rain cover, Reflector logo, Two water bottle/umbrella pockets, Secret-pocket at bottom for Rain cover and other stuffs, High-Quality zippers, Bartacks on pressure points for extra strength, Ergonomic design, etc.    




 

 Casual Stylish Backpack   This trendy backpack comes with multiple pockets and compartments and is very spacious and can accommodate all your stuff and will still be left with more space. With all features like padded handle, padded laptop compartment, reflector logo, bottle pockets, rain/dust cover etc, there is nothing that this backpack does not offer.  












 





 





 






 Backpack for Every Needs   This MADE IN INDIA Product features 3 large zippered compartments, 2 water bottle /umbrella pockets, Rain cover, Laptop Compartment, Top padded Handle for comfort. Its ergonomics comfortable design makes you forget the load you are carrying,  



 Spacious compartments   This casual backpack comes with three spacious zippered compartments which can accommodate your notebooks and other essentials with ease. Store your umbrella, notebooks and water bottle in this spacious bag and move around comfortably all day.  



 Comfort & Quality   This casual bag has Wide, Padded and Adjustable shoulder straps and Padded Back for comfort in carrying heavy items. Stitched properly and Bartacks on every pressure point for extra durability.  















 





 





 






 Rain / Dust Cover   This backpack includes a separate rain/dust cover which can be very handy. It keeps your valuables safe and secure from rain and dust and keeps the backpack neat and clean for a longer period of time.  



 Proudly Made in India   Half Moon is proud to be an Indian Brand. We understand the importance of Indian manufacturing and supply chains. It is the time when we revive local industries that's why this bag is Made in India by Indians using Indian materials.  



 Shipped Directly from Factory   Half Moon offers high-quality bags at the lowest prices. We offer bags directly from factory to the customer to provide the bag at lowest prices possible.

                                          Half Moon Large 37L Laptop College School Bag Backpack for Men & Women

Name: FUR JADEN Anti Theft Number Lock Backpack Bag with 15.6 Inch Laptop Compartment, USB Charging Port & Organizer Pocket for Men Women Boys Girls
Description: Stay organized all day with a durable and lightweight backpack from Fur Jaden. This back pack is a stylish and functional accessory for men and women. Can add admiration to an appealing and daring personality with a remarkable aesthetics and functionality. This backpack features an anti-theft design. You can also charge your phone on the go and organize your stuff like pro. Fur Jaden functional back pack is apt to protect your gadgets and belongings from being stolen while you travel, thanks to its special anti-theft design. Now keep your belongings safe with style. The backpack features multiple compartments that you may use for your laptop and other essentials. A remarkable feature of this backpack allows you to charge your phone while you are on the move. With an attached charging dock in the back you may connect a portable power bank with ease. Weighing about 600grams, this backpack is lightweight. The backpack is able to house a laptop of up to 15.6 inches and has seven inner compartments to place your other essentials. Made from durable quality polymer this Fur Jaden back pack is sturdy and reliable. Flaunt this bag with style and low maintenance as this bag is washable. This backpack is also suitable for school or college. The straps are designed to distribute the weight equally on each shoulder preventing any sort of discomfort. Use this back pack for office, college/school or during travels.

Description:
Product Description 

 



   


 









 





 





 






 Ergonomic Contoured Shape   With a slim, sleek and compact design you will love how this backpack can look small even with a spacious storage!  



 Fits Your Laptop   Take your gadgets with you anywhere with this backpack, it has got allotted storage space that fits a laptop of upto 15.6 inches.  



 Strong and Lightweight    Designed with great quality materials that are waterproof, tough and durable, it is also lightweight and easy to maintain.  









 








 

 Padded Back Straps   The back straps are padded to give the user maximum support and it made with anti-sweat fabric, giving you the comfort throughout the day.

 A Bag for any weather   Be it those stormy rainy season, scorching heat, or freezing winters, this bag can endure as it is crafted, designed and made with quality and tough materials.

Description:
Product Description 




   

 
  Half Moon Backpack - A Quality of Backpacks     We(Half Moon) are sellers and manufacturers of various types of Customized Bags. Our product array comprises Backpacks, Sports Bags, Duffel Bags, Drawstring Bags, etc. These bags accomplish the customer's specifications and requirements. We provide these bags in numerous colors, designs, shapes, shades, patterns, etc. Our bags are known for lightweight, easy carrying, versatile usage, and durable nature.    

 
  Features     DURABLE MATERIAL: Made with strong polyester fabric with heavy zippers. Serves the need of a professional office laptop bag, college bag, student backpack, school bag and is suitable for all, i.e. boys, girls, men and women.  COMFY & STURDY: Its padded, adjustable shoulder straps do not put pressure on the shoulders. Foamed padded top handle is easy on your palm and fingers. INNER MATERIAL: The material used in the inner compartments is thin yet strong and durable so, be assured of its quality. Thin material is used inside to make it lightweight & comfortable in carrying and to protect it from wear & tear. LOTS OF STORAGE SPACE & POCKETS: One separate Padded laptop compartment. Multiple compartments can store lots of stuff, that too organised. OTHER FEATURES: Rain cover, Reflector logo, Two water bottle/umbrella pockets, Secret-pocket at bottom for Rain cover and other stuffs, High-Quality zippers, Bartacks on pressure points for extra strength, Ergonomic design, etc.    




 

 Casual Stylish Backpack   This trendy backpack comes with multiple pockets and compartments and is very spacious and can accommodate all your stuff and will still be left with more space. With all features like padded handle, padded laptop compartment, reflector logo, bottle pockets, rain/dust cover etc, there is nothing that this backpack does not offer.  












 





 





 






 Backpack for Every Needs   This MADE IN INDIA Product features 3 large zippered compartments, 2 water bottle /umbrella pockets, Rain cover, Laptop Compartment, Top padded Handle for comfort. Its ergonomics comfortable design makes you forget the load you are carrying,  



 Spacious compartments   This casual backpack comes with three spacious zippered compartments which can accommodate your notebooks and other essentials with ease. Store your umbrella, notebooks and water bottle in this spacious bag and move around comfortably all day.  



 Comfort & Quality   This casual bag has Wide, Padded and Adjustable shoulder straps and Padded Back for comfort in carrying heavy items. Stitched properly and Bartacks on every pressure point for extra durability.  















 





 





 






 Rain / Dust Cover   This backpack includes a separate rain/dust cover which can be very handy. It keeps your valuables safe and secure from rain and dust and keeps the backpack neat and clean for a longer period of time.  



 Proudly Made in India   Half Moon is proud to be an Indian Brand. We understand the importance of Indian manufacturing and supply chains. It is the time when we revive local industries that's why this bag is Made in India by Indians using Indian materials.  



 Shipped Directly from Factory   Half Moon offers high-quality bags at the lowest prices. We offer bags directly from factory to the customer to provide the bag at lowest prices possible.

Description:
Product Description 




   

 
  Half Moon Backpack - A Quality of Backpacks     We(Half Moon) are sellers and manufacturers of various types of Customized Bags. Our product array comprises Backpacks, Sports Bags, Duffel Bags, Drawstring Bags, etc. These bags accomplish the customer's specifications and requirements. We provide these bags in numerous colors, designs, shapes, shades, patterns, etc. Our bags are known for lightweight, easy carrying, versatile usage, and durable nature.    

 
  Features     DURABLE MATERIAL: Made with strong polyester fabric with heavy zippers. Serves the need of a professional office laptop bag, college bag, student backpack, school bag and is suitable for all, i.e. boys, girls, men and women.  COMFY & STURDY: Its padded, adjustable shoulder straps do not put pressure on the shoulders. Foamed padded top handle is easy on your palm and fingers. INNER MATERIAL: The material used in the inner compartments is thin yet strong and durable so, be assured of its quality. Thin material is used inside to make it lightweight & comfortable in carrying and to protect it from wear & tear. LOTS OF STORAGE SPACE & POCKETS: One separate Padded laptop compartment. Multiple compartments can store lots of stuff, that too organised. OTHER FEATURES: Rain cover, Reflector logo, Two water bottle/umbrella pockets, Secret-pocket at bottom for Rain cover and other stuffs, High-Quality zippers, Bartacks on pressure points for extra strength, Ergonomic design, etc.    




 

 Casual Stylish Backpack   This trendy backpack comes with multiple pockets and compartments and is very spacious and can accommodate all your stuff and will still be left with more space. With all features like padded handle, padded laptop compartment, reflector logo, bottle pockets, rain/dust cover etc, there is nothing that this backpack does not offer.  












 





 





 






 Backpack for Every Needs   This MADE IN INDIA Product features 3 large zippered compartments, 2 water bottle /umbrella pockets, Rain cover, Laptop Compartment, Top padded Handle for comfort. Its ergonomics comfortable design makes you forget the load you are carrying,  



 Spacious compartments   This casual backpack comes with three spacious zippered compartments which can accommodate your notebooks and other essentials with ease. Store your umbrella, notebooks and water bottle in this spacious bag and move around comfortably all day.  



 Comfort & Quality   This casual bag has Wide, Padded and Adjustable shoulder straps and Padded Back for comfort in carrying heavy items. Stitched properly and Bartacks on every pressure point for extra durability.  















 





 





 






 Rain / Dust Cover   This backpack includes a separate rain/dust cover which can be very handy. It keeps your valuables safe and secure from rain and dust and keeps the backpack neat and clean for a longer period of time.  



 Proudly Made in India   Half Moon is proud to be an Indian Brand. We understand the importance of Indian manufacturing and supply chains. It is the time when we revive local industries that's why this bag is Made in India by Indians using Indian materials.

Name: Wesley Milestone 2.0 Casual Waterproof Laptop Backpack/Office Bag/School Bag/College Bag/Business Bag/Travel Backpack (Dimensions:13x18 inches) (Compatible with 39.62cm(15.6inch laptop) 30 L (Blue & black)
Description:
Product Description 

 



   


 









 





 





 






 Ergonomic Contoured Shape   With a slim, sleek and compact design you will love how this backpack can look small even with a spacious storage!  



 Fits Your Laptop   Take your gadgets with you anywhere with this backpack, it has got allotted storage space that fits a laptop of upto 15.6 inches.  



 Strong and Lightweight    Designed with great quality materials that are waterproof, tough and durable, it is also lightweight and easy to maintain.  









 








 

 Padded Back Straps   The back straps are padded to give the user maximum support and it made with anti-sweat fabric, giving you the comfort throughout the day.  



 

 Spacious Storage   Featuring 2 compartments, the main compartment and a front compartment to store smaller objects/pens/thin notebooks etc. It also includes a laptop sleeve with a Velcro strap for safety.  



 

 Back Support   It won’t feel uneasy to carry heavy things for a longer time with this bag as it has a cushioned back support that distributes weight evenly between your shoulders and back.  



 

 A Bag for any weather   Be it those stormy rainy season, scorching heat, or freezing winters, this bag can endure as it is crafted, designed and made with quality and tough materials.

Name: Half Moon 35 Ltrs Water Resistant 15.6 inch Laptop Bag for Men/Backpack for Men, Navy Blue | Office Bag for Men/Office Bag for Women with Padded Laptop Compartment | Rain Cover & Reflective Strips
Description:
Product Description 




   

 
  Half Moon Backpack - A Quality of Backpacks     We(Half Moon) are sellers and manufacturers of various types of Customized Bags. Our product array comprises Backpacks, Sports Bags, Duffel Bags, Drawstring Bags, etc. These bags accomplish the customer's specifications and requirements. We provide these bags in numerous colors, designs, shapes, shades, patterns, etc. Our bags are known for lightweight, easy carrying, versatile usage, and durable nature.    

 
  Features     DURABLE MATERIAL: Made with strong polyester fabric with heavy zippers. Serves the need of a professional office laptop bag, college bag, student backpack, school bag and is suitable for all, i.e. boys, girls, men and women.  COMFY & STURDY: Its padded, adjustable shoulder straps do not put pressure on the shoulders. Foamed padded top handle is easy on your palm and fingers. INNER MATERIAL: The material used in the inner compartments is thin yet strong and durable so, be assured of its quality. Thin material is used inside to make it lightweight & comfortable in carrying and to protect it from wear & tear. LOTS OF STORAGE SPACE & POCKETS: One separate Padded laptop compartment. Multiple compartments can store lots of stuff, that too organised. OTHER FEATURES: Rain cover, Reflector logo, Two water bottle/umbrella pockets, Secret-pocket at bottom for Rain cover and other stuffs, High-Quality zippers, Bartacks on pressure points for extra strength, Ergonomic design, etc.    




 

 Casual Stylish Backpack   This trendy backpack comes with multiple pockets and compartments and is very spacious and can accommodate all your stuff and will still be left with more space. With all features like padded handle, padded laptop compartment, reflector logo, bottle pockets, rain/dust cover etc, there is nothing that this backpack does not offer.  












 





 





 






 Backpack for Every Needs   This MADE IN INDIA Product features 3 large zippered compartments, 2 water bottle /umbrella pockets, Rain cover, Laptop Compartment, Top padded Handle for comfort. Its ergonomics comfortable design makes you forget the load you are carrying,  



 Spacious compartments   This casual backpack comes with three spacious zippered compartments which can accommodate your notebooks and other essentials with ease. Store your umbrella, notebooks and water bottle in this spacious bag and move around comfortably all day.  



 Comfort & Quality   This casual bag has Wide, Padded and Adjustable shoulder straps and Padded Back for comfort in carrying heavy items. Stitched properly and Bartacks on every pressure point for extra durability.  















 





 





 






 Rain / Dust Cover   This backpack includes a separate rain/dust cover which can be very handy. It keeps your valuables safe and secure from rain and dust and keeps the backpack neat and clean for a longer period of time.  



 Proudly Made in India   Half Moon is proud to be an Indian Brand. We understand the importance of Indian manufacturing and supply chains. It is the time when we revive local industries that's why this bag is Made in India by Indians using Indian materials.  



 Shipped Directly from Factory   Half Moon offers high-quality bags at the lowest prices. We offer bags directly from factory to the customer to provide the bag at lowest prices possible.

Description: Stay organized all day with a durable and lightweight backpack from Fur Jaden. This back pack is a stylish and functional accessory for men and women. Can add admiration to an appealing and daring personality with a remarkable aesthetics and functionality. This backpack features an anti-theft design. You can also charge your phone on the go and organize your stuff like pro. Fur Jaden functional back pack is apt to protect your gadgets and belongings from being stolen while you travel, thanks to its special anti-theft design. Now keep your belongings safe with style. The backpack features multiple compartments that you may use for your laptop and other essentials. A remarkable feature of this backpack allows you to charge your phone while you are on the move. With an attached charging dock in the back you may connect a portable power bank with ease. Weighing about 600grams, this backpack is lightweight. The backpack is able to house a laptop of up to 15.6 inches and has seven inner compartments to place your other essentials. Made from durable quality polymer this Fur Jaden back pack is sturdy and reliable. Flaunt this bag with style and low maintenance as this bag is washable. This backpack is also suitable for school or college. The straps are designed to distribute the weight equally on each shoulder preventing any sort of discomfort. Description: Stay organized all day with a durable and lightweight backpack from Fur Jaden. This back pack is a stylish and functional accessory for men and women. Can add admiration to an appealing and daring personality with a remarkable aesthetics and functionality. This backpack features an anti-theft design. You can also charge your phone on the go and organize your stuff like pro. Fur Jaden functional back pack is apt to protect your gadgets and belongings from being stolen while you travel, thanks to its special anti-theft design. Now keep your belongings safe with style. The backpack features multiple compartments that you may use for your laptop and other essentials. A remarkable feature of this backpack allows you to charge your phone while you are on the move. With an attached charging dock in the back you may connect a portable power bank with ease. Weighing about 600grams, this backpack is lightweight. The backpack is able to house a laptop of up to 15.6 inches and has seven inner compartments to place your other essentials. Made from durable quality polymer this Fur Jaden back pack is sturdy and reliable. Flaunt this bag with style and low maintenance as this bag is washable. This backpack is also suitable for school or college. The straps are designed to distribute the weight equally on each shoulder preventing any sort of discomfort. Name: Half Moon 35 Ltrs Water Resistant 15.6 inch Laptop Bag for Men/Backpack for Men, Navy Blue | Office Bag for Men/Office Bag for Women with Padded Laptop Compartment | Rain Cover & Reflective Strips
Description:
Product Description 




   

 
  Half Moon Backpack - A Quality of Backpacks     We(Half Moon) are sellers and manufacturers of various types of Customized Bags. Our product array comprises Backpacks, Sports Bags, Duffel Bags, Drawstring Bags, etc. These bags accomplish the customer's specifications and requirements. We provide these bags in numerous colors, designs, shapes, shades, patterns, etc. Our bags are known for lightweight, easy carrying, versatile usage, and durable nature.    

 
  Features     DURABLE MATERIAL: Made with strong polyester fabric with heavy zippers. Serves the need of a professional office laptop bag, college bag, student backpack, school bag and is suitable for all, i.e. boys, girls, men and women.  COMFY & STURDY: Its padded, adjustable shoulder straps do not put pressure on the shoulders. Foamed padded top handle is easy on your palm and fingers. INNER MATERIAL: The material used in the inner compartments is thin yet strong and durable so, be assured of its quality. Thin material is used inside to make it lightweight & comfortable in carrying and to protect it from wear & tear. LOTS OF STORAGE SPACE & POCKETS: One separate Padded laptop compartment. Multiple compartments can store lots of stuff, that too organised. OTHER FEATURES: Rain cover, Reflector logo, Two water bottle/umbrella pockets, Secret-pocket at bottom for Rain cover and other stuffs, High-Quality zippers, Bartacks on pressure points for extra strength, Ergonomic design, etc.    




 

 Casual Stylish Backpack   This trendy backpack comes with multiple pockets and compartments and is very spacious and can accommodate all your stuff and will still be left with more space. With all features like padded handle, padded laptop compartment, reflector logo, bottle pockets, rain/dust cover etc, there is nothing that this backpack does not offer.  












 





 





 






 Backpack for Every Needs   This MADE IN INDIA Product features 3 large zippered compartments, 2 water bottle /umbrella pockets, Rain cover, Laptop Compartment, Top padded Handle for comfort. Its ergonomics comfortable design makes you forget the load you are carrying,  



 Spacious compartments   This casual backpack comes with three spacious zippered compartments which can accommodate your notebooks and other essentials with ease. Store your umbrella, notebooks and water bottle in this spacious bag and move around comfortably all day.  



 Comfort & Quality   This casual bag has Wide, Padded and Adjustable shoulder straps and Padded Back for comfort in carrying heavy items. Stitched properly and Bartacks on every pressure point for extra durability.  















 





 





 






 Rain / Dust Cover   This backpack includes a separate rain/dust cover which can be very handy. It keeps your valuables safe and secure from rain and dust and keeps the backpack neat and clean for a longer period of time.  



 Proudly Made in India   Half Moon is proud to be an Indian Brand. We understand the importance of Indian manufacturing and supply chains. It is the time when we revive local industries that's why this bag is Made in India by Indians using Indian materials.  



 Shipped Directly from Factory   Half Moon offers high-quality bags at the lowest prices. We offer bags directly from factory to the customer to provide the bag at lowest prices possible.

Can add admiration to an appealing and daring personality with a remarkable aesthetics and functionality. This backpack features an anti-theft design. The backpack features multiple compartments that you may use for your laptop and other essentials. A remarkable feature of this backpack allows you to charge your phone while you are on the move. Name: Half Moon 35 Ltrs Water Resistant 15.6 inch Laptop Bag for Men/Backpack for Men, Navy Blue | Office Bag for Men/Office Bag for Women with Padded Laptop Compartment | Rain Cover & Reflective Strips
Description:
Product Description 




   

 
  Half Moon Backpack - A Quality of Backpacks     We(Half Moon) are sellers and manufacturers of various types of Customized Bags. Our product array comprises Backpacks, Sports Bags, Duffel Bags, Drawstring Bags, etc. These bags accomplish the customer's specifications and requirements. We provide these bags in numerous colors, designs, shapes, shades, patterns, etc. Our bags are known for lightweight, easy carrying, versatile usage, and durable nature.    

 
  Features     DURABLE MATERIAL: Made with strong polyester fabric with heavy zippers. Serves the need of a professional office laptop bag, college bag, student backpack, school bag and is suitable for all, i.e. boys, girls, men and women.  COMFY & STURDY: Its padded, adjustable shoulder straps do not put pressure on the shoulders. Foamed padded top handle is easy on your palm and fingers. INNER MATERIAL: The material used in the inner compartments is thin yet strong and durable so, be assured of its quality. Thin material is used inside to make it lightweight & comfortable in carrying and to protect it from wear & tear. LOTS OF STORAGE SPACE & POCKETS: One separate Padded laptop compartment. Multiple compartments can store lots of stuff, that too organised. OTHER FEATURES: Rain cover, Reflector logo, Two water bottle/umbrella pockets, Secret-pocket at bottom for Rain cover and other stuffs, High-Quality zippers, Bartacks on pressure points for extra strength, Ergonomic design, etc.    




 

 Casual Stylish Backpack   This trendy backpack comes with multiple pockets and compartments and is very spacious and can accommodate all your stuff and will still be left with more space. With all features like padded handle, padded laptop compartment, reflector logo, bottle pockets, rain/dust cover etc, there is nothing that this backpack does not offer.  












 





 





 






 Backpack for Every Needs   This MADE IN INDIA Product features 3 large zippered compartments, 2 water bottle /umbrella pockets, Rain cover, Laptop Compartment, Top padded Handle for comfort. Its ergonomics comfortable design makes you forget the load you are carrying,  



 Spacious compartments   This casual backpack comes with three spacious zippered compartments which can accommodate your notebooks and other essentials with ease. Store your umbrella, notebooks and water bottle in this spacious bag and move around comfortably all day.  



 Comfort & Quality   This casual bag has Wide, Padded and Adjustable shoulder straps and Padded Back for comfort in carrying heavy items. Stitched properly and Bartacks on every pressure point for extra durability.  















 





 





 






 Rain / Dust Cover   This backpack includes a separate rain/dust cover which can be very handy. It keeps your valuables safe and secure from rain and dust and keeps the backpack neat and clean for a longer period of time.  



 Proudly Made in India   Half Moon is proud to be an Indian Brand. We understand the importance of Indian manufacturing and supply chains. It is the time when we revive local industries that's why this bag is Made in India by Indians using Indian materials.  



 Shipped Directly from Factory   Half Moon offers high-quality bags at the lowest prices. We offer bags directly from factory to the customer to provide the bag at lowest prices possible.

Description:
Product Description 




   

 
  Half Moon Backpack - A Quality of Backpacks     We(Half Moon) are sellers and manufacturers of various types of Customized Bags. Our product array comprises Backpacks, Sports Bags, Duffel Bags, Drawstring Bags, etc. These bags accomplish the customer's specifications and requirements. We provide these bags in numerous colors, designs, shapes, shades, patterns, etc. Our bags are known for lightweight, easy carrying, versatile usage, and durable nature.    

 
  Features     DURABLE MATERIAL: Made with strong polyester fabric with heavy zippers. Serves the need of a professional office laptop bag, college bag, student backpack, school bag and is suitable for all, i.e. boys, girls, men and women.  COMFY & STURDY: Its padded, adjustable shoulder straps do not put pressure on the shoulders. Foamed padded top handle is easy on your palm and fingers. INNER MATERIAL: The material used in the inner compartments is thin yet strong and durable so, be assured of its quality. Thin material is used inside to make it lightweight & comfortable in carrying and to protect it from wear & tear. LOTS OF STORAGE SPACE & POCKETS: One separate Padded laptop compartment. Multiple compartments can store lots of stuff, that too organised. OTHER FEATURES: Rain cover, Reflector logo, Two water bottle/umbrella pockets, Secret-pocket at bottom for Rain cover and other stuffs, High-Quality zippers, Bartacks on pressure points for extra strength, Ergonomic design, etc.    




 

 Casual Stylish Backpack   This trendy backpack comes with multiple pockets and compartments and is very spacious and can accommodate all your stuff and will still be left with more space. With all features like padded handle, padded laptop compartment, reflector logo, bottle pockets, rain/dust cover etc, there is nothing that this backpack does not offer.  












 





 





 






 Backpack for Every Needs   This MADE IN INDIA Product features 3 large zippered compartments, 2 water bottle /umbrella pockets, Rain cover, Laptop Compartment, Top padded Handle for comfort. Its ergonomics comfortable design makes you forget the load you are carrying,  



 Spacious compartments   This casual backpack comes with three spacious zippered compartments which can accommodate your notebooks and other essentials with ease. Store your umbrella, notebooks and water bottle in this spacious bag and move around comfortably all day.  



 Comfort & Quality   This casual bag has Wide, Padded and Adjustable shoulder straps and Padded Back for comfort in carrying heavy items. Stitched properly and Bartacks on every pressure point for extra durability.  















 





 





 






 Rain / Dust Cover   This backpack includes a separate rain/dust cover which can be very handy. It keeps your valuables safe and secure from rain and dust and keeps the backpack neat and clean for a longer period of time.  



 Proudly Made in India   Half Moon is proud to be an Indian Brand. We understand the importance of Indian manufacturing and supply chains. It is the time when we revive local industries that's why this bag is Made in India by Indians using Indian materials.  



 Shipped Directly from Factory   Half Moon offers high-quality bags at the lowest prices. We offer bags directly from factory to the customer to provide the bag at lowest prices possible.

 Fits Your Laptop   Take your gadgets with you anywhere with this backpack, it has got allotted storage space that fits a laptop of upto 15.6 inches.  



 Strong and Lightweight    Designed with great quality materials that are waterproof, tough and durable, it is also lightweight and easy to maintain.  









 








 

 Padded Back Straps   The back straps are padded to give the user maximum support and it made with anti-sweat fabric, giving you the comfort throughout the day.  



 

 Spacious Storage   Featuring 2 compartments, the main compartment and a front compartment to store smaller objects/pens/thin notebooks etc. It also includes a laptop sleeve with a Velcro strap for safety.  



 

 Back Support   It won’t feel uneasy to carry heavy things for a longer time with this bag as it has a cushioned back support that distributes weight evenly between your shoulders and back.  



 

 A Bag for any weather   Be it those stormy rainy season, scorching heat, or freezing winters, this bag can endure as it is crafted, designed and made with quality and tough materials.

Product Description 




   

 
  Half Moon Backpack - A Quality of Backpacks     We(Half Moon) are sellers and manufacturers of various types of Customized Bags. Our product array comprises Backpacks, Sports Bags, Duffel Bags, Drawstring Bags, etc. These bags accomplish the customer's specifications and requirements. We provide these bags in numerous colors, designs, shapes, shades, patterns, etc. Our bags are known for lightweight, easy carrying, versatile usage, and durable nature.    

 
  Features     DURABLE MATERIAL: Made with strong polyester fabric with heavy zippers. Serves the need of a professional office laptop bag, college bag, student backpack, school bag and is suitable for all, i.e. boys, girls, men and women.  COMFY & STURDY: Its padded, adjustable shoulder straps do not put pressure on the shoulders. Foamed padded top handle is easy on your palm and fingers. INNER MATERIAL: The material used in the inner compartments is thin yet strong and durable so, be assured of its quality. Thin material is used inside to make it lightweight & comfortable in carrying and to protect it from wear & tear. LOTS OF STORAGE SPACE & POCKETS: One separate Padded laptop compartment. Multiple compartments can store lots of stuff, that too organised. OTHER FEATURES: Rain cover, Reflector logo, Two water bottle/umbrella pockets, Secret-pocket at bottom for Rain cover and other stuffs, High-Quality zippers, Bartacks on pressure points for extra strength, Ergonomic design, etc.    




 

 Casual Stylish Backpack   This trendy backpack comes with multiple pockets and compartments and is very spacious and can accommodate all your stuff and will still be left with more space. With all features like padded handle, padded laptop compartment, reflector logo, bottle pockets, rain/dust cover etc, there is nothing that this backpack does not offer.  












 





 





 






 Backpack for Every Needs   This MADE IN INDIA Product features 3 large zippered compartments, 2 water bottle /umbrella pockets, Rain cover, Laptop Compartment, Top padded Handle for comfort. Its ergonomics comfortable design makes you forget the load you are carrying,  



 Spacious compartments   This casual backpack comes with three spacious zippered compartments which can accommodate your notebooks and other essentials with ease. Store your umbrella, notebooks and water bottle in this spacious bag and move around comfortably all day.  



 Comfort & Quality   This casual bag has Wide, Padded and Adjustable shoulder straps and Padded Back for comfort in carrying heavy items. Stitched properly and Bartacks on every pressure point for extra durability.  















 





 





 






 Rain / Dust Cover   This backpack includes a separate rain/dust cover which can be very handy. It keeps your valuables safe and secure from rain and dust and keeps the backpack neat and clean for a longer period of time.  



 Proudly Made in India   Half Moon is proud to be an Indian Brand. We understand the importance of Indian manufacturing and supply chains. It is the time when we revive local industries that's why this bag is Made in India by Indians using Indian materials.  



 Shipped Directly from Factory   Half Moon offers high-quality bags at the lowest prices. We offer bags directly from factory to the customer to provide the bag at lowest prices possible.

Description:
Product Description 





 
  About the Product ( Shalimar Garbage Bag )     Shalimar garbage bags comes in roll form and in convenient packs of 30 or 15 bags. Each bag has a unique detachable tie-tape to tie the bags after use and for easy disposal. They are tough, thanks to a special type of star seal at the bottom. It comes with a simple perforation technology for quickly separating the bags from the roll. Our Garbage Bags are designed to spread the word of hygiene and cleanliness by easy disposal of waste. These bags offer great flexibility, convenience and ensure a high degree of hygiene, whether at home or in office. Garbage bag is a very useful product for places like Kitchen, Offices, Parties, etc.    

   

 
  WHY SHALIMAR ?     "Shalimar Group" is a four decade old company based on manufacturing of plastic packaging products used for Retail and Industrial market. In the retail market, we are the leading manufacturer of OXO Garbage Bags. We have our presence across India. 'Quality', 'Value' and 'Goodwill' are the three core words that govern our activities; these define our image, hard work, enhanced qualitative thinking and help us to develop products for customers seeking quality, dependability and excellence. We believe in providing great service to our customers, therefore any query regarding our products feel free to reach out to us.    


 KEY FEATURES : -   STAR SEALED BOTTOM FOR EXTRA STRENGTH :- The worst thing that could happen is when you’re on your way of taking out the trash and suddenly, the trash bag rips open from the bottom and everything falls out. Shalimar Garbage bags comes with star sealed bottom, which allows even weight distribution for extra strength and no leakage.MULTI-PURPOSE AND VERSATILE :- Garbage bag by Shalimar is the perfect choice because it’s ergonomically designed so that the bag easily fits in different shape bins ( square, round, oval, triangle, etc ). You can use it for indoor, outdoor, kitchen, office, living room, bedroom, bathroom, dog and cat waste, car trash, pet litter and many more.DETACHABLE TIE TAPE FOR EASY HANDLING :- Each bag has a unique detachable tie-tape to tie the bags after use and for easy disposal. They are tough, thanks to a special type of star seal at the bottom. At Shalimar, we pay attention to the details and include a tie-tape on every trash bag to tie the bag after use for easy and hygienic disposal of waste.  



   BENEFITS : -   Star Sealed BottomDetachable Tie-TapePerforation TechnologyExtra StrengthNo Leakage

Description: Stay organized all day with a durable and lightweight backpack from Fur Jaden. This back pack is a stylish and functional accessory for men and women. Can add admiration to an appealing and daring personality with a remarkable aesthetics and functionality. This backpack features an anti-theft design. You can also charge your phone on the go and organize your stuff like pro. Fur Jaden functional back pack is apt to protect your gadgets and belongings from being stolen while you travel, thanks to its special anti-theft design. Now keep your belongings safe with style. The backpack features multiple compartments that you may use for your laptop and other essentials. A remarkable feature of this backpack allows you to charge your phone while you are on the move. With an attached charging dock in the back you may connect a portable power bank with ease. Weighing about 600grams, this backpack is lightweight. The backpack is able to house a laptop of up to 15.6 inches and has seven inner compartments to place your other essentials. Made from durable quality polymer this Fur Jaden back pack is sturdy and reliable. Flaunt this bag with style and low maintenance as this bag is washable. This backpack is also suitable for school or college. The straps are designed to distribute the weight equally on each shoulder preventing any sort of discomfort. Use this back pack for office, college/school or during travels.

Description:
Product Description 





   


  About us   A sporty versatile Laptop Backpack from ADISA, made of Polyester. It has a top opening with 3 compartments for quick & easy access to essentials while the mesh padding on the back panel will feel comfortable, even on a hot day. This backpack can be carried in 2 ways as it has an additional front handle to hold it in case you’re unable to carry it on your back.   Light weight and spacious laptop backpack with 3 compartments. One compartment is for carrying laptop inside, with padding for safety, and space for laptop accessories like charger, etc. Other compartment has organiser for pens, visiting cards, etc along with space for carrying papers, files, etc. And third compartment is for your extra stuff. It has provision for holding bottles on both sides and has padded shoulder straps for your comfort.  









 





 





 






 Separate Laptop Compartment   One separate laptop compartment that can hold up to 15.6 Inch Laptop. Multiple compartments and Organiser can store lots of stuff, that too organized.Its padded, adjustable shoulder straps do not put pressure on the shoulders. Foamed padded top handle is easy on your palm and fingers.  



 Large Main Compartment   Fits up to 15.6 Inch Laptops (Laptops bigger than 15.6 inches not recommended)Thin clothes, headset, books, magazine, camera, CD's, etcFor Phones, pens, keys, wallets, purses, glasses, and other small itemsDurable elasticized mesh pockets on both sides fit water bottles, a small compact umbrella, and other items  



 Earphone Slot   Made with strong yet lightweight polyester fabric with heavy zippers. Serves the need of a professional office laptop bag, college bag, student backpack, school bag and is suitable for all with the charging system, i.e. adults, teens, boys, girls.Its padded, adjustable shoulder straps do not put pressure on the shoulders. Foamed padded top handle is easy on your palm and fingers.  












 
 



  Lightweight   With comfort and functionality as priorities, lots of people now use backpacks for their everyday  this 35-litre medium sized backpack would also be ideal for those thinking of an overnight trip. Complete with all the features of a daypack but with additional padding, pockets and fixing points for all the extra equipment you’ll need for a longer trip, the ADISA backpack is designed for multi-day use.  


 Multiple Compartments   Light weight and spacious laptop backpack with 3 compartments. One compartment is for carrying laptop inside, with padding for safety, and space for laptop accessories like charger, etc. Other compartment has organiser for pens, visiting cards, etc along with space for carrying papers, files, etc. And third compartment is for your extra stuff.It has provision for holding bottles on both sides and has padded shoulder straps for your comfort.  









 

 COLOR VARIATIONS

Description: Safari Quill is a 26 Litres, 2 compartment laptop backpack perfect for daily usage. It has a dedicated tech safe laptop sleeve that can hold upto 17 inch laptop or any smaller ones easily. The laptop sleeve is also fully padded from the bottom protecting your device from any shock or damage. This backpack is especially designed for todays fast paced world, where everything should be compact and lightweight. This backpack is perfect for everyday usage such as college, school, tuitions, or short holiday trips. The front pocket is designed to keep your essentials organized and side mesh pockets are perfect for storing your water bottle and umberella. Made of high grade water resistant polyester fabric, this backpack will last you several trips.

Description:
From the manufacturer 






 












 





 





 






 It's an edgy mix of fashionable details and practical usability. This backpack is made to accompany you on any adventure  



 With a capacity of 12 litres, this backpack comes with 2 zipper pockets that can house a notebook, gym gear, travel essentials and more.  



 The multi coated, water-repellent 600D polyester fabric design keeps your belongings safe whether you're on a short excursion or bustling through a commute.  















 





 





 






 The Mi Step Out Backpack is available in 4 trendy colors. The array of vibrant colors allow you to make your pick and stand out wherever you go.  



 Fully equipped with a water repellent exterior, contra zippers, reflective pullers and adjustable shoulder straps, this backpack is ideal companion for a hands-free day  



 Weighing just 200g, this backpack is easy to carry whether you're toting it through the airport, hitting the gym, exploring a new city or using it as a carrier for your books.

Description: This durable and lightweight backpack from Fur Jaden can keep you sorted throughout the day while also being super stylish, thus making it the perfect modern and functional accessory for any user – male or female. This backpack can be the perfect complement to your bold and charismatic persona, while its multiple inner chambers can hold all your stuff with convenience. Fur Jaden backpacks are young, vibrant and fashionable accessories which are also a symbol of sophistication. This backpack is high on aesthetics as well as on utility and functionality. This unisex backpack from Fur Jaden comes in an anti-theft design which lets you carry your laptop anywhere with confidence. Keep your belongings secure as your score high on the style quotient with this functional backpack. One of the most striking features of this backpack is that it allows you to charge your phone while you are travelling. The charging dock which comes attached to the backpack allows you to connect your portable charger seamlessly for maximum convenience.The material of this backpack from Fur Jaden is water resistant, which keeps any worries about getting it wet in the rain or accidental splashes at bay. Your laptop and every other belonging will stay safe from water as long as you keep them inside your backpack. This backpack from Fur Jaden comes with substantial capacity to accommodate your laptop and other goods with ease. The large capacity of this backpack can store laptops up to a 15.6 inches without any hassle. Weighing in at only 0.7kg, this Fur Jaden backpack with anti-theft feature is a breeze to carry around. Most of the weight you will feel is that of the goods you carry inside, as the backpack does not impose much weight on the user. This multipurpose and water resistant backpack from Fur Jaden can take you from day to night, thanks to its multiple compartments. With 1 main compartment and 7 small, inner pockets, it lets you store all your belongings and keeps them sorted too. Pattern: Solid.

Description:
Product Description 





 
  About the Product ( Shalimar Garbage Bag )     Shalimar garbage bags comes in roll form and in convenient packs of 30 or 15 bags. Each bag has a unique detachable tie-tape to tie the bags after use and for easy disposal. They are tough, thanks to a special type of star seal at the bottom. It comes with a simple perforation technology for quickly separating the bags from the roll. Our Garbage Bags are designed to spread the word of hygiene and cleanliness by easy disposal of waste. These bags offer great flexibility, convenience and ensure a high degree of hygiene, whether at home or in office. Garbage bag is a very useful product for places like Kitchen, Offices, Parties, etc.    

   

 
  WHY SHALIMAR ?     "Shalimar Group" is a four decade old company based on manufacturing of plastic packaging products used for Retail and Industrial market. In the retail market, we are the leading manufacturer of OXO Garbage Bags. We have our presence across India. 'Quality', 'Value' and 'Goodwill' are the three core words that govern our activities; these define our image, hard work, enhanced qualitative thinking and help us to develop products for customers seeking quality, dependability and excellence. We believe in providing great service to our customers, therefore any query regarding our products feel free to reach out to us.    


 KEY FEATURES : -   STAR SEALED BOTTOM FOR EXTRA STRENGTH :- The worst thing that could happen is when you’re on your way of taking out the trash and suddenly, the trash bag rips open from the bottom and everything falls out. Shalimar Garbage bags comes with star sealed bottom, which allows even weight distribution for extra strength and no leakage.MULTI-PURPOSE AND VERSATILE :- Garbage bag by Shalimar is the perfect choice because it’s ergonomically designed so that the bag easily fits in different shape bins ( square, round, oval, triangle, etc ). You can use it for indoor, outdoor, kitchen, office, living room, bedroom, bathroom, dog and cat waste, car trash, pet litter and many more.DETACHABLE TIE TAPE FOR EASY HANDLING :- Each bag has a unique detachable tie-tape to tie the bags after use and for easy disposal. They are tough, thanks to a special type of star seal at the bottom. At Shalimar, we pay attention to the details and include a tie-tape on every trash bag to tie the bag after use for easy and hygienic disposal of waste.  



  BENEFITS : -   Star Sealed BottomDetachable Tie-TapePerforation TechnologyExtra StrengthNo Leakage

Description:
Product Description 





   


 






 

 Make your own style statement.   Zipline Casual Polyester Backpack    For most of us, backpacks are a part of the daily arsenal – an essential tool for 21st-century life. But even if you’re no stranger to swinging a kettlebell around your back, there’s no escaping the heft this poses. If you need to lug your books or essentials things around all day, you’ll need a backpack. With us, you don’t have to worry about getting the best of it.  



 Features:      COMPACT     COMFORTABLE DESIGN     DURABLE MATERIAL     MULTI-FUNCTION COMPARTMENT     















 





 





 





 






 COMPACT   Get Your Space!   Backpack has a roomy Three compartment, front zipper pockets to hold small accessories, one internal security zippered pocket for valuable items and side pockets for water bottle or umbrella.  



 COMFORTABLE DESIGN   Finish like no other   Our backpack's "S" Curve adjustable, heavily padded shoulder straps and back panel make the backpack comfortable to wear even when loaded with all your gear.  



 DURABLE MATERIAL   Just the way you like it.   Superior quality durable, Natural, waterproof and anti-scratch polyester and featuring a reinforced bottom to withstand heavy use.  



 MULTI-FUNCTION COMPARTMENT   Perfect like you.   Backpack features multiple storage compartments and features for additional supplies and accessories as your, iPhone, iPad, pen, keys, wallet, books, clothes, bottle, passport and more.

Description: Presto! Offers Oxo-Biodegradable Garbage Bags To Help You Maintain Cleanliness And Hygiene In Your House, Office And Surroundings. These Garbage Bags Make Clean-Up And Garbage Disposal A Hassle-Free Task While Being Easy On The Environment! Line Them Up In Your Bedroom Or Bathroom Dustbins Or Use Them To Segregate Dry And Wet Waste In The Kitchen. Effectively Clear Out Messy Trash Like Baby Diapers And Kitty Litter! Handy At Offices Or Hotels, TheyRe Useful For Getting Rid Of Leftover Party Plates And Garbage As Well. They Come With A Detachable Tie-Tape Which Lets You Neatly Tie Up The Bag, Making It Easier To Carry Out After Use. These Small-Sized Bags Easily Fit Any Small Dustbins. They Are Available In Black Colour In A Pack Of 6 Rolls, And Each Roll Contains 30 Bags For Your Convenience.

It features a cushioned base and internal back padding to offer you extra comfort. The padded shoulder straps of this bag can be easily adjusted according to your liking. Spacious Featuring one front pocket and three main compartments, all with speciality zippers, this bag offers you enough space to carry your books, files, coins, travel accessories, stationery, keys and mobile accessories. Each bag has a unique detachable tie-tape to tie the bags after use and for easy disposal. They are tough, thanks to a special type of star seal at the bottom. It comes with a simple perforation technology for quickly separating the bags from the roll. Our Garbage Bags are designed to spread the word of hygiene and cleanliness by easy disposal of waste. These bags offer great flexibility, convenience and ensure a high degree of hygiene, whether at home or in office. Garbage bag is a very useful product for places like Kitchen, Offices, Parties, etc.    

   

 
  WHY SHALIMAR ?     "Shalimar Group" is a four decade old company based on manufacturing of plastic packaging products used for Retail and Industrial market. In the retail market, we are the leading manufacturer of OXO Garbage Bags. We have our presence across India. 'Quality', 'Value' and 'Goodwill' are the three core words that govern our activities; these define our image, hard work, enhanced qualitative thinking and help us to develop products for customers seeking quality, dependability and excellence. We believe in providing great service to our customers, therefore any query regarding our products feel free to reach out to us.    


 KEY FEATURES : -   STAR SEALED BOTTOM FOR EXTRA STRENGTH :- The worst thing that could happen is when you’re on your way of taking out the trash and suddenly, the trash bag rips open from the bottom and everything falls out. Shalimar Garbage bags comes with star sealed bottom, which allows even weight distribution for extra strength and no leakage.MULTI-PURPOSE AND VERSATILE :- Garbage bag by Shalimar is the perfect choice because it’s ergonomically designed so that the bag easily fits in different shape bins ( square, round, oval, triangle, etc ). You can use it for indoor, outdoor, kitchen, office, living room, bedroom, bathroom, dog and cat waste, car trash, pet litter and many more.DETACHABLE TIE TAPE FOR EASY HANDLING :- Each bag has a unique detachable tie-tape to tie the bags after use and for easy disposal. They are tough, thanks to a special type of star seal at the bottom. At Shalimar, we pay attention to the details and include a tie-tape on every trash bag to tie the bag after use for easy and hygienic disposal of waste.  



   BENEFITS : -   Star Sealed BottomDetachable Tie-TapePerforation TechnologyExtra StrengthNo Leakage

Description:
Product Description 




   

 
  Half Moon Backpack - A Quality of Backpacks     We(Half Moon) are sellers and manufacturers of various types of Customized Bags. Our product array comprises Backpacks, Sports Bags, Duffel Bags, Drawstring Bags, etc. These bags accomplish the customer's specifications and requirements. We provide these bags in numerous colors, designs, shapes, shades, patterns, etc. Our bags are known for lightweight, easy carrying, versatile usage, and durable nature.    

 
  Features     DURABLE MATERIAL: Made with strong polyester fabric with heavy zippers. Serves the need of a professional office laptop bag, college bag, student backpack, school bag and is suitable for all, i.e. boys, girls, men and women.  COMFY & STURDY: Its padded, adjustable shoulder straps do not put pressure on the shoulders. Foamed padded top handle is easy on your palm and fingers. INNER MATERIAL: The material used in the inner compartments is thin yet strong and durable so, be assured of its quality. Thin material is used inside to make it lightweight & comfortable in carrying and to protect it from wear & tear. LOTS OF STORAGE SPACE & POCKETS: One separate Padded laptop compartment. Multiple compartments can store lots of stuff, that too organised. OTHER FEATURES: Rain cover, Reflector logo, Two water bottle/umbrella pockets, Secret-pocket at bottom for Rain cover and other stuffs, High-Quality zippers, Bartacks on pressure points for extra strength, Ergonomic design, etc.    




 

 Casual Stylish Backpack   This trendy backpack comes with multiple pockets and compartments and is very spacious and can accommodate all your stuff and will still be left with more space. With all features like padded handle, padded laptop compartment, reflector logo, bottle pockets, rain/dust cover etc, there is nothing that this backpack does not offer.  












 





 





 






 Backpack for Every Needs   This MADE IN INDIA Product features 3 large zippered compartments, 2 water bottle /umbrella pockets, Rain cover, Laptop Compartment, Top padded Handle for comfort. Its ergonomics comfortable design makes you forget the load you are carrying,  



 Spacious compartments   This casual backpack comes with three spacious zippered compartments which can accommodate your notebooks and other essentials with ease. Store your umbrella, notebooks and water bottle in this spacious bag and move around comfortably all day.  



 Comfort & Quality   This casual bag has Wide, Padded and Adjustable shoulder straps and Padded Back for comfort in carrying heavy items. Stitched properly and Bartacks on every pressure point for extra durability.  















 





 





 






 Rain / Dust Cover   This backpack includes a separate rain/dust cover which can be very handy. It keeps your valuables safe and secure from rain and dust and keeps the backpack neat and clean for a longer period of time.  



 Proudly Made in India   Half Moon is proud to be an Indian Brand. We understand the importance of Indian manufacturing and supply chains. It is the time when we revive local industries that's why this bag is Made in India by Indians using Indian materials.  



 Shipped Directly from Factory   Half Moon offers high-quality bags at the lowest prices. We offer bags directly from factory to the customer to provide the bag at lowest prices possible.

Name: Shalimar Premium OXO - Biodegradable Garbage Bags (Medium) Size 48 cm x 56 cm 4 Rolls 120 Bags Dustbin Bag/Trash Bag - Black Color
Description:
Product Description 





 
  About the Product ( Shalimar Garbage Bag )     Shalimar garbage bags comes in roll form and in convenient packs of 30 or 15 bags. Each bag has a unique detachable tie-tape to tie the bags after use and for easy disposal. They are tough, thanks to a special type of star seal at the bottom. It comes with a simple perforation technology for quickly separating the bags from the roll. Our Garbage Bags are designed to spread the word of hygiene and cleanliness by easy disposal of waste. These bags offer great flexibility, convenience and ensure a high degree of hygiene, whether at home or in office. Garbage bag is a very useful product for places like Kitchen, Offices, Parties, etc.    

   

 
  WHY SHALIMAR ?     "Shalimar Group" is a four decade old company based on manufacturing of plastic packaging products used for Retail and Industrial market. In the retail market, we are the leading manufacturer of OXO Garbage Bags. We have our presence across India. 'Quality', 'Value' and 'Goodwill' are the three core words that govern our activities; these define our image, hard work, enhanced qualitative thinking and help us to develop products for customers seeking quality, dependability and excellence. We believe in providing great service to our customers, therefore any query regarding our products feel free to reach out to us.    


 KEY FEATURES : -   STAR SEALED BOTTOM FOR EXTRA STRENGTH :- The worst thing that could happen is when you’re on your way of taking out the trash and suddenly, the trash bag rips open from the bottom and everything falls out. Shalimar Garbage bags comes with star sealed bottom, which allows even weight distribution for extra strength and no leakage.MULTI-PURPOSE AND VERSATILE :- Garbage bag by Shalimar is the perfect choice because it’s ergonomically designed so that the bag easily fits in different shape bins ( square, round, oval, triangle, etc ). You can use it for indoor, outdoor, kitchen, office, living room, bedroom, bathroom, dog and cat waste, car trash, pet litter and many more.DETACHABLE TIE TAPE FOR EASY HANDLING :- Each bag has a unique detachable tie-tape to tie the bags after use and for easy disposal. They are tough, thanks to a special type of star seal at the bottom. At Shalimar, we pay attention to the details and include a tie-tape on every trash bag to tie the bag after use for easy and hygienic disposal of waste.  



   BENEFITS : -   Star Sealed BottomDetachable Tie-TapePerforation TechnologyExtra StrengthNo Leakage

Description: Stay organized all day with a durable and lightweight backpack from Fur Jaden. This back pack is a stylish and functional accessory for men and women. Can add admiration to an appealing and daring personality with a remarkable aesthetics and functionality. This backpack features an anti-theft design. You can also charge your phone on the go and organize your stuff like pro. The backpack features multiple compartments that you may use for your laptop and other essentials. A remarkable feature of this backpack allows you to charge your phone while you are on the move.
